item.title: Mental Health COVID-19 Teen Study in Iceland
item.description: Summary Background Adolescence represents a crucial developmental period in shaping mental health trajectories. In this study, we investigated the effect of the COVID-19 pandemic on mental health and substance use during this sensitive developmental stage. Methods In this longitudinal, population-based study, surveys were administered to a nationwide sample of 13â€“18-yearolds in Iceland in October or February in 2016 and 2018, and in October, 2020 (during the COVID-19 pandemic).
